SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.functions

Interface RatioToString<R,Q extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase,C extends FDSConfig & QuantityProcessor<Q>>

Type Parameters:
R - The type of ratio object to be converted.
Q - The type of quantity object to be converted.
C - The type of configuration object extending FDSConfig.
public interface RatioToString<R,Q extends org.hl7.fhir.instance.model.api.IBase,C extends FDSConfig & QuantityProcessor<Q>>
Interface for converting ratio objects to human-readable strings.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
jy95

    • convert

      default CompletableFuture<String> convert(TranslationService<C> translationService, R ratio)
      Converts a ratio object to a human-readable string asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      translationService - The service providing localized strings and configuration context.
      ratio - The ratio object to convert.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that resolves to the human-readable string.

    • retrieveRatioLinkWord

      default String retrieveRatioLinkWord(TranslationService<C> translationService, R ratio)
      Retrieves the link word based on the ratio's components.
      Parameters:
      translationService - The service providing localized strings and configuration context.
      ratio - The ratio object.
      Returns:
      The link word as a string.

    • hasUnitRatio

      default boolean hasUnitRatio(R ratio)
      Determines if the ratio has a unit in either numerator or denominator.
      Parameters:
      ratio - The ratio object.
      Returns:
      True if either the numerator or denominator has a unit, false otherwise.

      Determines if the ratio has a numerator.
      Parameters:
      ratio - The ratio object.
      Returns:
      True if the ratio has a numerator, false otherwise.
